descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Kevin Durant breaks out the moves before knocking down the triple.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Kevin Durant hits the 3-pointer vs. Detroit Pistons) 2021/10/31 ESHEET

videos.headline: KD sinks step-back trey

videos.description: James Harden passes one over the top to Kevin Durant for the basket plus a foul.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (James Harden shows off his vision with nice pass vs. Detroit Pistons) 2021/10/31 ESHEET

videos.headline: Harden flings pass ahead to KD for and-1 bucket

videos.description: Blake Griffin taps the ball over to Joe Harris in the corner for a 3-pointer.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Check out this sweet pass from Blake Griffin) 2021/10/31 ESHEET

videos.headline: Griffin makes nice touch pass to set up Harris' 3-pointer

videos.description: James Harden keeps Kelly Olynyk off balance as he drives through for an and-1 layup.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (James Harden with the and-1 bucket) 2021/10/31 ESHEET

videos.headline: Harden blows by Olynyk for and-1 basket

videos.description: Blake Griffin knocks down a basket with the shot clock about to expire.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Blake Griffin knocks down basket) 2021/10/31 ESHEET

videos.headline: Blake Griffin adjusts midair for the bucket

videos.description: James Harden finds Kevin Durant out in transition for a one-handed jam.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (James Harden shows off his vision with nice pass vs. Detroit Pistons) 2021/10/31 ESHEET

videos.headline: Harden connects with KD for a slam

videos.description: James Johnson attacks the rim and hammers one in the face of Josh Jackson.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (James Johnson dunks all over Josh Jackson) 2021/10/31 ESHEET

videos.headline: James Johnson dunks all over Josh Jackson

videos.description: Kevin Durant is assessed a flagrant foul 2 after elbowing Kelly Olynyk and is ejected from the game.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Durant ejected after elbowing Olynyk) 2021/10/31 ESHEET

videos.headline: Durant ejected after elbowing Olynyk
